document_data.name: Nouméa Cardellith
document_data.mainbody: '''Nouméa Cardellith''' (maiden name '''Nouméa Fairbright''') was a [[Sembian]] [[wizard]] and an apprentice of [[Elminster Aumar]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: During her encounter with Elminster, she was wearing, almost certainly as part of a complete attire, golden slippers with spike heels.
document_data.Personality: She was practical and not reticent to respond to absurd situations.
document_data.Abilities: Great Lady Calabrista had taught her a number of things including [[the Art]].
document_data.Possessions: She carried early on a ''[[wand of ever-searing flames]]''.
document_data.Relationships: She had been a student of Great Lady [[Calabrista]] before meeting Elminster.
document_data.History: She met Elminster as one of Great Lady Calabrista's best students on [[Eleasias 4]] of the {{yearlinkName|1364}}.{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|2|Realmslore}} During the meeting, she attacked a persistent [[Red Wizard]] with a "wand of ever-searing flames" which made Elminster quite interested.
